info.description: Tilkee is an online platform that makes cross-functional collaboration happen. Combining deep knowledge of sales enablement with augmented intelligence, the vision of the team behind Tilkee is to align marketing with sales and guide Sales, Product Marketing, Channel Enablement, and Customer Success teams towards digital transformation.
info.title: Tilkee

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Search using keywords you tagged on the items.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Add related objects to your query results.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Navigate to your query results pages using this parameter to skip already-read results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Define how many results you want to receive (default: 20)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Use keywords to search in items name.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: Find items owned by a specific user by providing his user ID.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Find items of a specific type.

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: Find items with a specific extension.

parameters.name: shared
parameters.description: Find items that have been shared with you.

parameters.name: favorite
parameters.description: Find items that you set as favorite.

parameters.name: tag_operator
parameters.description: Define if query with tags must use AND or OR operators to retrieve items.

parameters.name: created_at_start
parameters.description: Define a date, items retrieved will be the ones created after this specific date.

parameters.name: created_at_end
parameters.description: Define a date, items retrieved will be the ones created before this specific date.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Must be application/json

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Describe your new item.

parameters.name: consulted

parameters.name: verdict

parameters.name: is_template
parameters.description: Find projects that are templates.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Provide the Project ID of the project you want to find.
